ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Belt of Concordance speedup
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Gimmie a tell John, I would be happy to loan you it for a test.  Also Ezhar has a FBSS, I am sure he will lend it too you for a full set of test :) ...
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
> Sent: Monday, April 03, 2000 10:18 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Belt of Concordance speedup
> My hunch is it'll do the same combined with any enchanter
> speedup, including augmentation. I don't believe the FBSS and
> Swirlspine belt work like this, as the timings I've seen for
> those just added 15%ish speedup to the song. (Wanna lend me
> yours so I can test it, Rokenn? :)
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
-------------------------------
Gimmie a tell John, I would be happy to loan you it for a test. Also Ezhar
has a FBSS, I am sure he will lend it too you for a full set of test :)
